message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this great product that I think you'll really love. I'm asking for $200 for it. What do you think?
I really like the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $60. I'm a bit of a bargain hunter, so I was hoping we could meet in the middle.
Hi Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $60 is way too low for the value of this product. How about we meet in the middle at $140?

I understand you think the product is worth more than $60, but I'm still a bit hesitant to pay $140. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my previous offer, so I'll offer $90 for the product. I'm hoping we can come to a mutually beneficial agreement.
